CustomField.description: Denoting as Opportunity Plan Account means that if they are not a client we have an account plan as to how we are going to work towards adding them as a client. If they are a client then it requires that we have an Annual Strategy Review with them where we go over their plans and match up how our plans work with their business goals, how we support them etc.
CustomField.inlineHelpText: If Non-Client: How to work towards adding as a client. If Client: Requires that we have an Annual Strategy Review with them where we go over their plans and match up how our plans work with their business goals, how we support them etc.
CustomField.label: Opportunity Plan Account
